caption: b'We take safety so seriously, even our jack-o-lanterns wear the right equipment. Have a safe and happy Halloween!'

b'We strive to protect the environment wherever we operate. In Indonesia, we support an elephant conservation program in the Riau Province. We recently provided GPS trackers to monitor the movement of the endangered Sumatran elephants. #chevronpacificindonesia'

b'As we move through the energy transition it\xe2\x80\x99s important to find ways to meet energy needs with less carbon-intensive products. It\xe2\x80\x99s why we\xe2\x80\x99re working with partners to deliver a fuel called Chevron Renewable Diesel to select stations in San Diego.'
b'A fuel made from ingredients like vegetable oil and used cooking oils is a fuel made to meet the energy transition. This is Chevron Renewable Diesel.'
b'Getting the job done safely brings a certain kind of joy. That\xe2\x80\x99s the kind of operational excellence we strive for every day.\xe2\x80\x8b'

b'Whether digital or analog, technology takes human ingenuity to its highest level. The sextant is a navigation tool used by mariners since the 1700s that\xe2\x80\x99s still used today alongside digital technology such as GPS and radar.\xe2\x80\x8b'

b'Did you know that in May 1973, we produced one million barrels of oil per day from the Rokan block in Indonesia? We are proud to be a part of Indonesia\xe2\x80\x99s energy history. #chevronpacificindonesia'

b'For almost 30 years, our partnership with Kazakhstan has helped fuel economic growth and supported local communities through investments in education, social and health infrastructure. #globalimpact #socialimpact #usgloballeadershipcoalition'

b'Chevron is proud to officially welcome Noble Energy\xe2\x80\x99s employees, partners and communities. Click on the link in our bio to learn how this acquisition will bring together the best of each organization.'

b':fuel_pump: Our Richmond Refinery in California has a 118 year history of innovation. Techron, our revolutionary fuel additive that helps keep car engines clean, was invented here in 1979. And the refinery\xe2\x80\x99s Modernization Project will create a newer, safer, cleaner refinery.'

b'1952 marks the first shipment of oil from Minas field in Riau, Indonesia. The event was officiated by then Economic Minister Sumanang Suryominoto. We are proud to be a part of Indonesia\xe2\x80\x99s energy history. #chevronpacificindonesia'
b'Something about the fall colors makes our service stations feel even more inviting. Road trip, anyone?'
b'Something about the fall colors makes our service stations feel even more inviting. Road trip, anyone?'
b'As long as COVID-19 creates needs in our communities, we\xe2\x80\x99ll continue our support of initiatives that make a real impact.'
b'Happy Independence Day to the people and government of Indonesia. Selamat Hari Kemerdekaan Indonesia! #chevronpacificindonesia'

b'For over 95 years, we have operated in the Riau Province, Indonesia. Our community partnerships help strengthen local communities. Congratulations to the people and government of the Riau Province on their anniversary. #chevronpacificindonesia'

b'one of the best things about summer is camp, and this year we\xe2\x80\x99ve created our own virtual experience for kids of employees and contractors - camp chevron. all the activities are hosted and provided by employees, interns, retirees, executives, community organizations and other partners. we\xe2\x80\x99re excited to come together to support our workforce and their families in this fun and unique way.'
b"our commitment to sustainability means getting results by doing things the right way. read the 2019 corporate sustainability report and learn how we're doing just that. link in bio."
b"as the human energy company, we put people at the center of everything we do. see how we're making progress for people in the 2019 corporate sustainability report. link in bio."

b"we're working toward some notable environmental sustainability goals. check out some highlights here, and read the 2019 corporate sustainability report to learn even more about our efforts to protect to the environment. link in bio."
b'we\xe2\x80\x99ve made strides in sustainability. read our 2019 corporate sustainability report to see what we mean. link in bio.'
b"even though many of our employees are still working from home, we raised rainbow flags at several office locations to kick off this year's pride month celebrations."
b'black lives matter. head to the link in our bio to read on. chevron.co/blmig'
b'the pascagoula refinery was added to chevron\xe2\x80\x99s operations in 1963. since then, it\xe2\x80\x99s become our largest refinery in the U.S.'

b'our first-ever virtual internship program kicked off this week and we are thrilled to welcome over 500 interns from around the world to work with us remotely and help solve the complex energy challenges of today and tomorrow.'

b'facing a shortage of hand sanitizer supplies, France asked companies to step in and help meet demand. chevron oronite labs responded and is using part of our facilities to create supplies. check out our link in bio for more about our COVID-19 initiatives.'

b'to support delivery riders and bus drivers, our caltex stations in Singapore are offering a special discount on fuel. check out our link in bio to learn more about this program and all of our COVID-19 efforts.'

b'we\xe2\x80\x99ve donated $1 million in chevron gift cards to organizations providing health and medical services, charitable food supplies and local first responders in the U.S. to show gratitude for their important work. check out the link in our bio to read about our ongoing COVID-19 response.'

b'to support the people on the front lines of COVID-19, we\xe2\x80\x99ve donated 100,000 surgical masks from the supplies in our medical clinics to hospitals and health networks in california. our link in bio gives more details about our full response.'
b'merche knows dance doesn\xe2\x80\x99t work without collaboration. now more than ever, working together in new ways is a skill we all need. #humanenergy'

b'one year ago, the world met a special pup named boonrod. he was miraculously rescued by one of our crews in Thailand, who found him swimming 135 miles (!!!) out at sea. they took boonrod aboard their operation, nursed him back to health and brought him back to the mainland. then, as if this story wasn\xe2\x80\x99t amazing enough, boonrod was adopted by one of the employees who found him. help us wish a happy one year adoption anniversary to boonrod and his amazing owner by replying \xe2\x80\x9cgood boy boonrod\xe2\x80\x9d below!'

b'as part of our COVID-19 response, we\xe2\x80\x99re working with @fabfndn to produce PPE for the local hospitals, nursing homes, and first responders in many communities where we operate. we\xe2\x80\x99re on the side of safety. click the link in our bio to learn more.'

b'we\xe2\x80\x99ve pledged $1.2 million to help fund emergency services and economic relief in western australia. we are committed to supporting our local communities and employees who make up our global workforce throughout the COVID-19 health crisis. our focus areas include: \xe2\x97\x8ffinancial support
\xe2\x97\x8fhealth services
\xe2\x97\x8fupskilling opportunities

click the link in our bio to learn more about our COVID-19 response efforts.'
b"ulises isn't just curious about new ways of cooking. his creative mind prepares him to seek the tech of tomorrow. #humanenergy"

b"through our 2:1 humankind match program, we've matched employee contributions to provide $2 million towards local relief efforts and U.S.-based non-profits. click on the link in our bio to read more about our response to COVID-19."

b'we\xe2\x80\x99re helping @donorschoose in their support of teachers and students through #KeepKidsLearning. our $500,000 grant will help make sure learning doesn\xe2\x80\x99t have to be put on hold because classrooms aren\xe2\x80\x99t open.'
b'we are committed to supporting our shared communities around the world in response to COVID-19. click on the link in our bio learn more about our efforts, and continue to check for updates.'
b'employees like tiffany bring compassion to their communities and work every day.  #humanenergy'

b'even in today\xe2\x80\x99s difficult times, we know from experience that overcoming challenges requires a pursuit of innovation, commitment to partnership, trust in markets and belief in the power of human energy. visit the link in our bio to learn more in our 2019 annual report.'
b'sometimes, our homes are the perfect place to create. adam\xe2\x80\x99s creativity takes flight with every new brew. #nationalbeerday'
b'to learn more, head to the link in our bio.'
b'did you know?'
b'maria: woman. runner. analyst. proof that employees who bring their whole selves to the job are the most inspiring. #humanenergy'
b':cow_face::pile_of_poo:=:delivery_truck::fuel_pump:'
b"chad's love for running transformed his community. he brings that same energy to his work as a geoscientist every day. #humanenergy"
b"monica was inspired to take on engineering. now she's giving young girls the confidence and tools to do the same. #humanenergy"
b'when climbing, steven plans for the worst, hopes for the best, and is always ready to adapt. he faces his work at chevron with that same attitude. #humanenergy'
b'geologist, dog trainer, and advocate for veterans. laura is one example of the humanity employees bring to chevron each day. #humanenergy'
b"being human takes energy, and we're using ours to create new solutions to help meet the needs of people on this planet in affordable, reliable, and ever-cleaner ways. #humanenergy"
b'happy #womeninscienceday AKA every day at chevron :woman_scientist:'
b"we're using our global resources, determination, and ingenuity to meet today's energy challenges."
b'through our strategic social investments, we partner with communities to support economic development, education and health programs that contribute to our mutual success.'
b"we're proud to encourage bright young students like isaac mustopulo through educational programs around the world. see what's been motivating isaac since he won a grant from chevron in 2014."
b'seeing local artisans grow their businesses and revive traditional craft in Kazakhstan makes us proud to partner with communities where we operate.'
b'no matter where we work, it\xe2\x80\x99s essential that our work is done responsibly #chevron'
b'our success is driven by our people and their commitment to getting things done the right way.'
b'every day is #hatday when you come to work each morning focused on staying safe.'
b'the immense size of VLCCs (very large crude carriers) helps lower the total cost per delivered barrel of crude oil. #chevron #VLCC'
b'chevron ships have been an important part of our business for over 120 years. #chevron #TBT'
b'chevron shipping delivers affordable, reliable, ever-cleaner energy around the world via our fleet of creatively-named very large crude carriers (VLCCs). #chevron #VLCC'

b'paint, decorations, ornaments, lights, rubber, stickers, plastic bags\xe2\x80\xa6 can you guess the one ingredient that all of these items have in common? for the answer, visit the link in our bio. #chevron #humanenergy'

b'the winter solstice officially kicks off the winter season and is the shortest day of the year. the upside? the days will only have more sunshine from here and it\xe2\x80\x99s a great time for holiday cheer! :sparkles:#wintersolstice #holidaycheer #chevron'
b"north pole, alaska :round_pushpin: is \xe2\x80\x98the city where the spirit of christmas lives year-round.\xe2\x80\x99 let's take a stroll with mayor mike welch through this festive city."

b'enabling human progress begins with respecting human rights. this approach is rooted in our values and applies wherever we do business. 
_
:woman_construction_worker_selector: employees: we treat all employees with respect and dignity, and promote diversity in the workplace.
_
:locked: security: we protect personnel and assets, and provide a secure environment for business operations.
_
:cityscape: communities: we commit to regularly engage communities near our operational and project areas in meaningful conversations.
_
:delivery_truck: suppliers: we expect our suppliers and contractors to respect human rights and adhere to applicable international principles.
_
:handshake: other business partners: we encourage our customers and business partners to respect human rights and the adhere to applicable international principles. 
_
#chevron #humanrightsday #humanenergy'
b'on #internationalvolunteerday we want to take a moment to say thank you to the generous, kind, and hard-working volunteers we\xe2\x80\x99re lucky to call coworkers every day. #chevron'

b'giving tuesday reminds us that delivering affordable, reliable, and ever-cleaner energy sometimes looks different in action. it\xe2\x80\x99s why we partnered with @pactworld to install over 10,000 solar lights \xe2\x80\x93 providing over 200,000 people with electricity in Myanmar. #givingtuesday #chevron #humanenergy'

b'powering the lost hills oil field with #solarenergy not only requires a location with lots of sunlight, but also a team willing to innovate and learn new systems. thankful to have plenty of both. @sunpower #sunpower #chevron'

b'we\xe2\x80\x99re taking steps toward an ever-cleaner future at our lost hills oil field. go to our stories to learn how we\xe2\x80\x99re leaning into renewable energy sources. #chevron #humanenergy #renewable'

b'working at chevron can take you to extreme locations: at sea, in the mountains, or even in the desert. lost hills oil field in california is a prime example of what our \xe2\x80\x98offices\xe2\x80\x99 sometimes look like.'
b'we\xe2\x80\x99ve done the math. using advanced data analytics in the permian basin helps make our operations efficient with less impact to the region. read more at the link in our bio.'

b'what if gas could provide unbeatable cleaning for engines and minimize emissions at the same time? that\xe2\x80\x99s exactly what our engine lab is trying to make a reality. brian takes us behind the scenes on our igtv channel to experience a day in the life at our energy lab. #DITL #chevron #humanenergy'

b'every year, Veterans Day reminds us to be grateful for all the men and women who\xe2\x80\x99ve given so much as part of the U.S armed forces. thankfully, for us at chevron, it\xe2\x80\x99s also a reminder to honor many of the people we get to work with each and every day. #veteransday'
b'can you guess where this refinery is located? hint: it was founded in 1911.'

b'in the san joaquin valley of california, where heavy oil makes up about 86 percent of our production, we use steam injection to make the oil flow more easily and to enable us to continue to recover these resources.'
b'the construction of our richmond refinery started in 1901, the same year oil was first found in spindletop, texas, launching modern petroleum history. #chevron'

b'for our employees, every moment of every day on the job requires keeping themselves and coworkers safe. sometimes it even means keeping a local whale shark safe\xe2\x80\xa6 like this team in Thailand did.'
b"we're investing in electric vehicle (EV) battery and charging technology companies like #natronenergy and @chargepoint to enable more charging more efficiently."
b'the sharper bow design on our new very large crude carriers (VLCCs) helps reduce wave resistance, improving efficiency at slower speeds. click the link in our bio to get the full VLCC experience.'

b'we\xe2\x80\x99re constantly striving to reduce our carbon footprint in our pursuit of developing ever-cleaner energy solutions. the exhaust gas cleaning systems on our new VLCCs (very large crude carriers) help reduce sulfur oxide emissions by up to 80%, exceeding worldwide standards.'
b'our new VLCCs (very large crude carriers) are taking efficiency to the next level through technology like this advanced propeller nozzle, which helps the ship move more smoothly.'

b'one of our newest ships, the San Ramon Voyager, is a VLCC (very large crude carrier) engineered to haul up to 80 million gallons of crude oil. that\xe2\x80\x99s enough to take about 40,000 road trips around the globe. visit the link in our bio to learn more about this impressive vessel.'

b'meet the El Segundo Voyager, one of our new very large crude carriers (VLCCs). supported by a hardworking crew, these ships can easily spend multiple weeks at sea. set a course for the link in our bio for more VLCC info.'

b'our fleet is growing. pictured here is the Richmond Voyager, a new VLCC (very large crude carrier) that helps bring affordable, reliable, and ever-cleaner energy to the globe. click the link in our bio to learn more about these very large ships.'
b"We're digitizing the way we work & exploring ways to use renewable energy in our operations so we can deliver affordable, reliable, and ever-cleaner energy solutions. #HumanEnergy #PermianBasin"
b"Our Upstream operations have reduced the amount of fresh water withdrawn from the environment by 25% since 2014. See what else we've been up to through the link in our bio."

b'We are protecting mangroves in Indonesia through the Mangrove Ecosystem Restoration Alliances (MERA) in partnership with the government and Yayasan Konservasi Alam Nusantara, a local affiliate of @nature_org\nPhoto credit: @nature_org\n#IPAConvex2019'

b'Our partnerships and investments in #Indonesia have demonstrated our "gotong royong" spirit, which means sharing burdens and working as one family.
#IPAConvex2019
#humanenergy
@ipaconvex_'

b'During our time in Indonesia, we have leveraged technology to recover more energy from existing fields.
#IPAConvex2019
#humanenergy
@ipaconvex_'

b'We partnered in Myanmar with @Pactworld, an NGO, for the Ahlin Yaung (meaning \xe2\x80\x9clight\xe2\x80\x9d) program. This program supplied over 10,000 solar-powered lights in 340 villages.\n\nThis has allowed families to work more hours and students to study for longer. Learn more through the link in our bio.'

b'The plight of a young sports team trapped in the flooded caves of Chiang Rai, Thailand, captured the world\xe2\x80\x99s attention during the summer of 2018. 
16 Chevron employees and 18 contractors mobilized to the cave site and were supported by nearly 100 employees and contractors working remotely around the clock as part of the Emergency Management team. 
Within 24 hours of the Thai Navy SEALs\xe2\x80\x99 request for resources, Chevron committed hundreds of oxygen tanks, dozens of tank packs and several gas detectors to monitor air quality in various cave chambers.

Learn more through the link in our bio!'

b"In 2018, our employees and retirees contributed thousands of volunteer hours and millions in donations to U.S. nonprofits. Learn more about how we're enabling human progress through the link in our bio!"

b"In the past five years, Chevron has spent $154 billion globally on goods and services, helping grow economies, create jobs and develop workforces. See what else we've been up to through the link in our bio!"
b'Through our investment in Carbon Engineering, we\xe2\x80\x99re supporting the development of technologies to capture CO2 from the air and transform it into cleaner fuels.'
b'We :blue_heart: the Chevron Learning Pathway!'
b'Anyone know where I am? \nHint: :Canada:'

b'Did you know there\xe2\x80\x99s a wetland in downtown #Calgary? The #ChevronLearningPathway winds around a constructed inner-city wetland designed to treat stormwater before it flows back into the Bow River.'

b"Interested in learning more about how Chevron is accelerating the use of digital technology? Here's a sneak peek of Michelle Pflueger's comments on the Intertrust Tech Lightning podcast, then swipe up on our highlights to hear the full podcast."

b'We\xe2\x80\x99ve solved some of the most complex energy challenges of the past, and together we will innovate for the future. Learn more about Chevron Technology Ventures\xe2\x80\x99 investments in Natron Energy and @ChargePoint.'
b"We've committed $100M to our Future Energy Fund to invest in emerging technologies."

b"Our Quarantine Management System, deployed on Barrow Island, won the 2015 Australian Government's Biosecurity Award for Chevron's efforts to safeguard the native species and island ecosystem by preventing the introduction of non-native species during the Gorgon Project's construction."
